nodes.text: Frax was a male Kajain'sa'Nikto who lived in the galaxy. While being chased by TIE fighters on the planet Odona, Han Solo left him for dead in the Cordaxian Sea because the Millennium Falcon was holding two tons of Cordaxian ore. Solo dumped Frax in the Cordaxian sea along with the ore. He later tried to kill Solo and Leia Organa but failed and died in a snow storm, his frozen body poised to shoot Organa.
